description: A modern e-commerce platform for selling t-shirts, featuring a 3D t-shirt viewer.

client.description: The front-end of the application, what users see and interact with in their web browser. It is responsible for the user interface (UI), including the 3D t-shirt viewer.

libraries.name: React
libraries.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

libraries.name: @react-three/drei
libraries.description: A collection of useful helpers and abstractions for @react-three/fiber.

libraries.name: Tailwind CSS
libraries.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

server.description: The back-end of the application. It runs on a remote computer (a server) and handles the business logic, like processing payments with Stripe and managing data.

libraries.name: Stripe
libraries.description: The official Stripe library for Node.js, used to securely process payments.

docker.description: The application is containerized using Docker for consistent development and deployment environments.

ci_cd.description: A CI/CD pipeline is defined to automatically build, push, and deploy the application to Google Cloud Run on every push to the main branch.
